title: The Fate of DJ Lou's Toes
description:
DJ Lou gives a health update on the fate of his toes, a special needs kid rap battles, and Jay will never become friends with Fat Joe!

Stream "The Bonfire with Big Jay Oakerson & Dan Soder" for 3 months free on the SiruisXM app! Offer Details Apply: www.SiriusXM.com/Bonfire
